meanings.sent1: The unbridled horse galloped wildly through the field.
meanings.sent2: Her unbridled enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent3: The unbridled puppy's energy was both adorable and exhausting.
meanings.sent4: His unbridled anger caused a rift in their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The unbridled joy on her face was evident to everyone at the party.

meanings.sent1: The unbridled growth of the city led to traffic congestion.
meanings.sent2: Her unbridled ambition knew no bounds.
meanings.sent3: The unbridled excitement over the new ice cream flavor was palpable.
meanings.sent4: The unbridled imagination of the author created a captivating story.
meanings.sent5: The unbridled potential of the young athlete was recognized by all.
